DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Timesheets and Leaves
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Hours and Leaves per Year and Month","WidgetType":"pivotgrid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":600,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"queryText","value":"With YearsDates
AS
(
	SELECT DISTINCT
		Month([Day]) as [Month], 
		Year([Day]) as [Year]
	FROM 
		YearDay
	WHERE 
		[Day] between @FromDate and @ToDate
)
SELECT
	v.Company,
	v.Client,
	v.ClientResponsible,
	v.ClientGroup,
	v.Project,
	v.ProjectOwner,
	v.[User],
	v.EmployeeResponsible,
	v.[Month],
	v.[Year],
	v.Typology,
	v.TypologyGroup,
	v.Department,
	v.Division,
	v.Product,
	v.TaxpayerNumber,
	v.ExternalNumber,
	v.Overtime,
	v.IsActive,
	v.UserType,
	v.IsLeave,
	v.[Hours],
	CASE 
		when v.[Month] = 1 then '01 January'
		when v.[Month] = 2 then '02 February' 
		when v.[Month] = 3 then '03 March'
		when v.[Month] = 4 then '04 April'
		when v.[Month] = 5 then '05 May'
		when v.[Month] = 6 then '06 June'
		when v.[Month] = 7 then '07 July'
		when v.[Month] = 8 then '08 August'
		when v.[Month] = 9 then '09 September'
		when v.[Month] = 10 then '10 October'
		when v.[Month] = 11 then '11 November'
		when v.[Month] = 12 then '12 December'
		else 'N/A' 
	END [MonthName]
FROM
(
	SELECT
		'' as Company,
		'' as Client,
		'' as ClientResponsible,
		'' as ClientGroup,
		'' as Project,
		'' as ProjectOwner,
		'' as [User],
		'' as EmployeeResponsible,
		v.[Month],
		v.[Year],
		'' as Typology,
		'' as TypologyGroup,
		'' as Department,
		'' as Division,
		'' as Product,
		'' as TaxpayerNumber,
		'' as ExternalNumber,
		0 as Overtime,
		0 as IsActive,
		'' as UserType,
		0 as IsLeave,
		0 as [Hours]
	FROM 
		YearsDates v
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		v.Company,
		v.Client,
		v.ClientResponsible,
		v.ClientGroup,
		v.Project,
		v.ProjectOwner,
		v.[User],
		v.UserResponsible as EmployeeResponsible,
		v.[Month],
		v.[Year],
		ut.[Name] as Typology,
		v.UserTypologyGroup as TypologyGroup,
		v.Department,
		v.Division,
		v.ProductName as Product,
		u.TaxpayerNumber,
		u.ExternalNumber,
		u.PaidOvertime AS Overtime,
		ssu.IsActive,
		utp.[Name] as UserType,
		0 as IsLeave,
		SUM(v.ActualTime) as [Hours]
	FROM 
		Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) v,
		[SecuritySystemUser] ssu,
		[User] u
		LEFT OUTER JOIN  UserType utp ON (utp.Oid = u.UserType)
		LEFT OUTER JOIN  UserTypology ut ON (ut.Oid = u.Typology)
	WHERE 
		v.UserId = u.Oid
		AND v.UserId = ssu.Oid
		AND v.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate
	GROUP BY 
		v.Company,
		v.Client,
		v.ClientResponsible,
		v.ClientGroup,
		v.Project,
		v.ProjectOwner,
		v.[User],
		v.UserResponsible,
		v.[Month],
		v.[Year],
		ut.[Name],
		v.UserTypologyGroup,
		v.Department,
		v.Division,
		v.ProductName,
		u.TaxpayerNumber,
		u.ExternalNumber,
		u.PaidOvertime,
		ssu.IsActive,
		utp.[Name]
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		v.Company,
		'' as Client,
		'' as ClientResponsible,
		'' as ClientGroup,
		'' as Project,
		'' as ProjectOwner,
		v.[User],
		'' as EmployeeResponsible,
		v.[Month],
		v.[Year],
		ut.[Name] as Typology,
		v.UserTypologyGroup as TypologyGroup,
		v.Department,
		v.DivisionName as Division,
		'' as Product,
		u.TaxpayerNumber,
		u.ExternalNumber,
		u.PaidOvertime as Overtime,
		ssu.IsActive,
		utp.[Name],
		1 as IsLeave,
		SUM(v.[Hours]) as [Hours]
	FROM 
		Analytics.Leave(@CurrentUserId) v,
		[SecuritySystemUser] ssu,
		[User] u
		LEFT OUTER JOIN  UserType utp ON (utp.Oid = u.UserType)
		LEFT OUTER JOIN  UserTypology ut ON (ut.Oid = u.Typology)
	WHERE 
		v.UserId = u.Oid
		AND v.UserId = ssu.Oid
		AND v.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate
	GROUP BY 
		v.Company,
		v.[User],
		v.[Month],
		v.[Year],
		ut.[Name],
		v.UserTypologyGroup,
		v.Department,
		v.DivisionName,
		u.TaxpayerNumber,
		u.ExternalNumber,
		u.PaidOvertime,
		ssu.IsActive,
		utp.[Name]
) v
","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Period Selector
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Closed and In Progress Tickets","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":1,"WidgetHeader":{"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2019-01-01","endDate":"2019-12-31","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"queryText","value":"SELECT
	SUM(v.[Hours]) as [Hours],
	v.[Month]
FROM
(
	SELECT 
		SUM(v.ActualTime) as [Hours],
		DATEFROMPARTS(v.[Year], v.[Month], 1) as [Month]
	FROM
		Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) v
	WHERE	
		v.[Date] between DateAdd(mm, -12, getdate()) and getdate()
	GROUP BY
		DATEFROMPARTS(v.[Year], v.[Month], 1)
	UNION ALL
	SELECT 
		SUM(v.[Hours]) as [Hours],
		DATEFROMPARTS(v.[Year], v.[Month], 1) as [Month]
	FROM
		Analytics.Leave(@CurrentUserId) v
	WHERE	
		v.[Date] between DateAdd(mm, -12, getdate()) and getdate()
	GROUP BY
		DATEFROMPARTS(v.[Year], v.[Month], 1)
	UNION ALL
	SELECT 
		SUM(v.[Hours]) as [Hours],
		DATEFROMPARTS(v.[Year], v.[Month], 1) as [Month]
	FROM
		Analytics.Leave(@CurrentUserId) v
	WHERE	
		v.[Date] between DateAdd(mm, -12, getdate()) and getdate()
	GROUP BY
		DATEFROMPARTS(v.[Year], v.[Month], 1)
) v
GROUP BY
	v.[Month]
","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{}}]
